name: BirdBOT
description:
Digital work belonging to the series: LuckyBOTS

the other story
Its original inhabitants were an advanced generation of robots whose most relevant characteristics were respect for their peers and for that space in the universe where they had developed.
It was the human beings who invaded their planet which they called Earth.
But it had already happened on their planet of origin, which they had to abandon due to the devastating calamities that they themselves had caused; wars, deforestation, pollution, and on two other planets that were subjected in the same way causing irreversible damage.
Human beings who do not learn. They take, destroy and depart.
The few robots that withstood that era of systematic destruction are trying to rebuild themselves.
The work is hard, slow, constant. At the moment they are imperfect, asymmetrical…
Despite the experience, from time to time, something of a girl, a boy, or those creatures that humans called pets appear in their polished figures...
